rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Not bad, huh?
You can see eeeverything from up here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0002
rows.name: It beats walking, that's for sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0003
rows.name: "The best way to see NLA."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0004
rows.name:
I never get tired of this view...
It's like a different city, every time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0005
rows.name:
It's certainly come a long way in the last few weeks...
but there's still so much to be done...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0006
rows.name: One day at a time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Speaking of which, we don't really have time
for a full pleasure cruise here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Why don't you give us the express tour, Lin—
just the highlights?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0009
rows.name: Okay, you got it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0010
rows.name: New LA is divided into four districts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0011
rows.name:
We departed from the industrial district—
where Doug and I were conducting the flight test.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0012
rows.name:
It has food production, Skell development...
You know, industries and stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's also where the West Gate is located. Remember?
Expect to pass through there fairly often.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0014
rows.name:
The only other gate out of the city is in
the administrative district—but I'm skipping ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0015
rows.name: Next is the commercial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0016
rows.name: Restaurants, galleries, cafés, clothing, groceries—you name it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0017
rows.name: It's a veritable shopping paradise![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0018
rows.name:
The CD is the closest thing to a "downtown" we've got.
It can actually get pretty crowded sometimes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Well, by NLA standards, anyway.
Day or night, the best—and only—bargains on the planet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0020
rows.name: To your right: the residential district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Housing, housing and...more housing.
Well, plus a nice park and the cathedral.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0022
rows.name:
If you're ever looking for quiet time alone or want to
relax and unwind with a good book, that's the spot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0023
rows.name: Right? The park is my favorite place to just zone out and chill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Aaand last but not least, our destination:
the administrative district! The nerve center at the heart of NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0025
rows.name: Note the distinct dual-level structure here:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0026
rows.name:
The upper level holds our administrative tower,
home to BLADE HQ and the government...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0027
rows.name:
not to mention Armory Alley
as well as the barracks where we live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0028
rows.name:
The lower level there is a hangar complex
for Skell maintenance and repairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0029
rows.name: And this concludes our tour. We will be landing shortly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0030
rows.name: Thanks, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0031
rows.name:
We'll save the rest of orientation
for once we're back at the barracks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0032
rows.name:
Enjoy your stay in the administrative district,
and thank you for flying Lin Lee Airlines.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0033
rows.name: Right—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0034
rows.name:
Let's get you over to the barracks.
Then I should file my report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0035
rows.name:
They'll be eager to hear the details
on how I found you, I'm sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0036
rows.name: Well then, we better not keep them waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0037
rows.name: The barracks are pretty close, actually—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0038
rows.name: they're set up juuust behind the giant BLADE Tower here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0039
rows.name:
That road there wraps around the left side
and leads right to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01030100_MSG0040
rows.name:
We'll pass through Armory Alley, but let's not get
sidetracked, okay? We can check it out later.[ST:wait ]
